I was in fnb own business for 13 years.  Seen many fuck up cheapos from online orders.
Example. Order beef steak from food panda... Customer complain food panda... Every thing was there side dish veggies corn blah blah blah. But the beef steak was not there. So refund..
Possible?????Knn either the rider ate the steak... Or my shop tooooo stupid to forget to put the steak in
Error msg: Something went wrong  pleas try agin next time .
So I complain lor bang table... Take the food panda device to head office.  Smash the device in front of them
Hahaahhaa in the end I still pay 100 plus for the device wahahaha
But I walked away with my ego still intact
Moral of the story money can always earn back.
But if your not wrong.  Stand your ground
